wikipedia_page.main: Kate Fenton (born 14 October 1954) is an English novelist and former BBC radio producer. She lives near Whitby in Yorkshire.

response: Nine years later, he married novelist Kate Fenton in 1992 and they remained married until his death in 2010.
Actor Ian Carmichael lived in the village for many years with his wife, novelist Kate Fenton.
* Kate Fenton (born 1954) – Failsworth-born novelist and former BBC radio producer
